sentences.en: As a writer, her forte is comedy.
sentences.cn: 作为作家，她的专长是写喜剧。

sentences.en: As far as the piano is concerned , sentiment is my forte.
sentences.cn: 钢琴之道, 情操之妙.

sentences.en: Cooking is her forte.
sentences.cn: 她擅长烹调.

sentences.en: Diplomacy was not Margaret's forte.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特对外交事务不内行.

sentences.en: Games are his forte; he plays cricked and football excellently.
sentences.cn: 体育运动是他的所长, 他打板球和踢足球都很好.

sentences.en: Games are his forte; he plays tennis and football excellently.
sentences.cn: 体育运动是他的所长, 他打网球和踢足球都很好.

sentences.en: He found that running long distances was not his forte .
sentences.cn: 他发现长跑并不是他的强项。

sentences.en: Her forte is playing the piano.
sentences.cn: 她擅长弹钢琴.

sentences.en: Hirudoid/ Hirudoid forte promote the absorption of oedema and haematoma.
sentences.cn: 喜疗妥乳膏/强喜疗妥乳膏能促进水肿和血肿的吸收。

sentences.en: His forte is after - dinner speeches.
sentences.cn: 他的特长是饭后演说.

sentences.en: His forte is on the operations”, says Ashok Kumar, an analyst at Rodman &Renshaw LLC, in a Bloomberg Television interview
sentences.cn: “他的长处是运营”，在彭博电视采访中一名Rodman &Renshaw 公司的分析员Ashok Kumar曾说过。

sentences.en: His forte is to show people around in the company.
sentences.cn: 他最拿手的就是向大家介绍公司.

sentences.en: Languages were never my forte.
sentences.cn: 语言从来就不是我的强项。

sentences.en: Moscow-based Kaspersky Lab has long been a magnet for Russia's young computer geniuses, luring them away from their usual forte, hacking, to viral analysis.
sentences.cn: 总部位于莫斯科的卡巴斯基实验室许久以来就是吸引俄罗斯年轻计算机英才的一块磁石，诱使他们远离自己平常的黑客特长，转而从事病毒分析。

sentences.en: Originality was never his forte.
sentences.cn: 他从来不擅长独立创作。

sentences.en: Singing is not really my forte, but I'll try.
sentences.cn: 唱歌实在不是我擅长的, 但是我试着唱唱看.

sentences.en: Star Nanning Ya - mode impianto di gas una forte pubblicit à business.
sentences.cn: 南宁亚星气模厂是一家技术力量雄厚的广告企业.

sentences.en: The small talk was not the forte of either leader.
sentences.cn: 两位领导人都不善于闲谈.

sentences.en: To negotiate with our buyers is my forte.
sentences.cn: 与买方谈判是我的特长。

sentences.en: You know reverence is not my forte.
sentences.cn: 你知道我是不讲究礼节的.

trans.tran_en: to be something that you do well or are skilled at
